column1: Has anyone tried using Yammer?;Yammer looks like a good tool for us to have sales talks
Using google drive as a CRM;I just started using google for business
column2: and the online cloud tools seem like they could be a better solution to excel. I know this is a potential security risk
column3: but it might cut some costs;sales-MarketingDashboard600.jpg

column1: Sales mentor for West Europe;We have been having some troubles closing accounts in the UK and Spain as of late
column2: and I was thinking it would be a good idea to bring in a sales mentor I know who has sold engineering products in this geographical area.;Sales- article_large.jpg
